headline: Show HN: Chesskool – Platform for Chess Improvement
description:
Launch day is here! This has been my passion project, to recreate Duolingo for chess!

I always thought Duolingo had amazing "hooks" to help people learn new languages, so I implemented its spaced-repetition, reports and daily and weekly training reminders in a Chess learning platform for chess improvers!

I built it in Meteor.js and React.js. I chose Meteor to be able to add Cordova in the future.

The Caro-Kann course (for white) is completely free, if you guys want to try it.

What do you folks think?
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Chesskool - 国际象棋改进平台
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Chesskool - 國際象棋改進平臺
description_zh-Hans:
启动日到了! 这一直是我的激情项目，为国际象棋重新创造Duolingo！

我一直认为Duolingo有惊人的"钩"来帮助人们学习新的语言，所以我在国际象棋学习平台中实现了它的间隔重复、报告以及每日和每周的训练提醒，供国际象棋提高者使用！

我用Meteor.js和React.js构建它。我选择Meteor是为了将来能够添加Cordova。

Caro-Kann课程（针对白棋）是完全免费的，如果你们想试试的话。

各位朋友觉得怎么样？
